
# Background

::: {.notes}
forests are facing a number of challenges
- increased demands on forest
    - recreation
    - biodiversity
    - timber
- reduced staff (more area per forester) 
:::

- extreme events will increase
:::


## Disturbances

Forests suffered severe drought stress in recent years

This amplified massive bark beetle outbreaks

German forests hit particularly heavy in recent years

- more than 500.000 ha (5 %) forest loss (2018-2020) (@thonfeldFirstAssessmentCanopy2022)
- 255 mio. m³ affected timber (2018-2022) ([BMEL](https://www.bmel.de/DE/themen/wald/wald-in-deutschland/wald-trockenheit-klimawandel.html))
